headline: ComEd Receives National Recognition for Clean Energy Workforce Training Program
summary: CHICAGO, November 24, 2025--In recognition of ComEd’s commitment to community-driven workforce programming and bringing strong outcomes for local job seekers, the Center for Energy Workforce Development (CEWD) has honored ComEd with the 2025 Community Partner Award. The award is reserved for companies and organizations in the energy power sector delivering innovative programs, anchored in community partnership, and which seek to ensure the workforce is reflective of the communities served.

headline: FERC approves PECO-Amazon data center transmission agreement
summary: The pact raises “significant questions” about how the agency and states will protect existing customers from the costs of adding large loads to the grid, FERC Commissioner Judy Chang warned.
